loan.name: Juan Carlos
loan.use: To buy honey, bottles to fill with honey, snack foods, and beverages to continue his sales.
loan.description:
Juan is 45 years old and married to his wife, who handles the household duties.

He has a business selling honey, snack foods, and beverages. Juan learned this trade from his in-laws. The business sits in front of his home on the edge of the Highway. Juan manages his business from 6:00 A.M. to 5:00 P.M. He previously worked as a day laborer.

Juan needs a loan to buy honey, bottles to fill with honey, snack foods, and beverages to continue his sales. He dreams of generating more income and expanding his shop.
loan.whySpecial: It helps borrowers withstand negative economic impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic.
